FuncDef: This command defines the ETH-CFM opcodes of interest to be debugged.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that debugging is enabled for all ETH-CFM packets.

Specifies a standard numerical reference or common three-letter acronym (TLA) that identifies the CFM PDU type. Up to five opcodes can be specified, and a combination of both numbers and TLAs can be used. Values-MEP: 1 to 255 | common TLA.
